name: art-und-weise
description: Onlineshop for student company "Art und Weise"

scripts.update-copy: npm update && npm run copy-bootstrap-scss && npm run copy-bootstrap-js && npm run copy-jquery-js
scripts.copy-bootstrap-scss: copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/bootstrap/scss/* src/bootstrap &&copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/bootstrap/scss/forms/* src/bootstrap && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/bootstrap/scss/helpers/* src/bootstrap && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/bootstrap/scss/mixins/* src/bootstrap && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/bootstrap/scss/utilities/* src/bootstrap && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/bootstrap/scss/vendor/* src/bootstrap
scripts.serve: npm run make-dist-ready & npm run compile-folder && npm run start-dev-server
